thread.title: BRIEF-Aquabounty Technologies, Inc. Announces FDA Approval Of First U.S. Facility For Commercial Production Of Aquadvantage Salmon

title: BRIEF-Aquabounty Technologies, Inc. Announces FDA Approval Of First U.S. Facility For Commercial Production Of Aquadvantage Salmon

organizations.name: fda approval of first u.s. facility for commercial production of aquadvantage salmon
first u.s. facility for commercial production of aquadvantage salmon reuters

text:
April 27, 2018 / 5:32 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Aquabounty Technologies, Inc. Announces FDA Approval Of First U.S. Facility For Commercial Production Of Aquadvantage Salmon Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - AquaBounty Technologies Inc:
* AQUABOUNTY TECHNOLOGIES, INC. ANNOUNCES FDA APPROVAL OF FIRST U.S. FACILITY FOR COMMERCIAL PRODUCTION OF AQUADVANTAGE SALMON
* AQUABOUNTY TECHNOLOGIES INC - WITH FACILITY APPROVED, COMMERCIAL PRODUCTION OF AQUADVANTAGE SALMON AWAITS OFFICIAL LABELING GUIDELINES BY FDA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
